venue.name: Holy Apostles Sts. Peter and Paul Church

item.description:
Lets go out to the Greek Festival and have some Souvlaki, moussaka, pastichio, spinach pie, loukoumades and other pastries.

We can view some of the Greek artisans works and hear some of the sounds of Greek music.

Raffle tickets for a 42-inch, flat-screen TV, cash and other items are available at the door. Prizes will be awarded Sunday afternoon. There is also a $100.00 door prize.

So come on out to Holy Apostles Sts. Peter and Paul Church.

Because we are not sure where a good place to meet is, when you arrive please call the meetup phone to locate where we are. The meetup phone is 978-304-2811.

Inclement weather will cancel this event.

Hope to see you all at the festival.

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Call the meetup phone upon arriving
item.name: Greek Festival - Haverhill MA
